quote: Results from the DSC controller chip show that our approach is more effective than others that use non-session-based test scheduling.
All the tens of embedded memories are tested by the built-in self-test (BIST) circuits generated by our memory BIST compiler.
Test results justify that short test integration cost, short test time, and small area overhead can be achieved.
the coexistence of scan test and functional test for logic cores.
The USB core has 4 clock domains, 3 reset signals, 1 scan enable (SE) signal, and 6 test signals.
The area of the WBR cell is equivalent to 26 two-input NAND gates.
